hibernate-mapping.query: select R from FriendRequest R where (R.ToId = :UserId) AND StatusID = 1
select R from FriendRequest R where (R.ToId = :toUserId AND R.FromId = :fromUserId) or (R.FromId = :toUserId AND R.ToId = :fromUserId) AND StatusID = 2
select R from FriendRequest R where (R.ToId = :userId OR R.FromId = :userId) AND StatusID = 2
